about_the_game:
Called as Operators and fighting in a surreal, virtual world, Vtubers, just made a splendid debut of a magnificent performance…



Virtua Unlimited Project is a 2D pixel-art style action game featuring VTuber characters. This is a world exclusively belonging to all sorts of Vtubers active in cyberspace. Playing as Aizawa Kana, a hot Vtuber, you will venture into this NEO Babylon world and fight with Vtubers capable of different superpowers. Will they appear as someone you are familiar with or challenge you with strange abilities? Don’t let your guard down!

With core gameplay inspired by Rxxkman-Z series on GBA, this game combines many excellent features including adorable pixel visuals, classical platformer gameplay, retro combat designs, and many more exploration elements. Moreover, role-playing elements are emphasized enough for you to savor every moment of glitz and glamour of each Vtuber.





In 2XXX, the world's largest quantum computer [Babylon] made a prediction.
Humanity will be extinguished within a century.

To save humanity, Dr. Hungerz Ridley proposed the#K{{ [New World Plan]}}.
According to it, all humans would hibernate in pods while nanobots work on the ecological restoration of Earth.
When awake, humans could start a new life in the reborn world.

The plan succeeded. Two new things emerged in the new world.
One is [Existence Support Point], or E.S.P in short.
The other is [Chaos Contamination Incident], also known as Chaos.



Chaos incidents are unpredictable natural disasters.
In chaos, [Rioters] are continuously generated to
wreak havoc within a certain area with indiscriminate attacks.
The only way for humanity to tackle chaos is to keep destroying Rioters until the disasters completely disappear.

E.S.P is a new type of energy generated from the bonds between humans.
Humans can easily convert E.S.P into other types of energy through the current technologies.
Fortunately, E.S.P greatly helps humans tackle with chaos.

Some special humans can even harness E.S.P on their own.
With the supernatural power from E.S.P, they fight on the front line against chaos.
At the forefront of every industry, they play an active role in boosting global development through E.S.P.



They are called as — "Operator".

Based on E.S.P, [NEO Babylon Government] built a new currency system.
As the NEO Babylon Government's 50th anniversary ceremony draws on.
some unpredictable undercurrents seem to be rising in this peaceful world…





By defeating "Operator" Bosses, players can acquire some parts of Bosses’ powers and attributes. The attribute growth can also enhance players’ support skills and activate EX Skill.





There are element counter rules among Bosses, and knowing how to exploit this is key to victory.
After some "friendly communications", the Boss will join your side. They can be summoned and aid you in combats with "Support Skills".







The game introduces action system highlighted by the "Extreme Flying Kick." It can be used to interact with environments and enemies, and grants the character a brief period of invincibility after kicking the target. It can be canceled out by other special moves, providing a combination of different tricks to be explored!





Hidden in the game levels are various "Extensions" such as "Ice Surface Anti-Slip," "Quick Charge," "Auto Charge," "Auto Recovery," a range of special abilities for the character.
Please actively explore every nook and cranny of the levels. Plan and increase the slots of Extension that can be installed, and over-install is allowed but with penalties.
detailed_description:
FOLLOW US

Follow us for the latest info:

Twitter：VRS_VUP、Neverland Entertainment

YouTube：Neverland_Entmt

Discord：Neverland_Entmt

name: Virtua Unlimited Project

subs.option_text: Virtua Unlimited Project 虚拟无限计划 - $10.99 $8.24 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7& Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 集成声卡
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7& Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 集成声卡

short_description: Virtua Unlimited Project is a 2D pixel-art style ACT game featuring VTuber characters. With classical platformer gameplay, challenging combat, and retro game feelings, VUP presents you a surreal, virtual world in which you will play as Aizawa Kana to venture and seek the truth beneath.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
